subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: A road cyclist with the surname Armstrong won a long anticipated Olympic gold medal on Wednesday afternoon. Only this was not Lance Armstrong, who never won a gold. It was Kirstin Armstrong.
snippet: A road cyclist with the surname Armstrong won a long anticipated Olympic gold medal on Wednesday afternoon. Only this was not Lance Armstrong, who never won a gold. It was Kirstin Armstrong.
